title.rendered: The State of Social Lead Generation

content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow” css=”.vc_custom_1579193330327{margin-bottom: 3% !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Get into the minds of 320+ pro marketers in these informative, easy-to-read pages.

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1577387741921{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

In partnership with SharpSpring, Social Media Today compiled results from their Fall 2019 survey of 328 of the industry’s top marketing minds — and now, we’re sharing the data with you.

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Get ready to learn what marketers across the U.S. think about social lead generation performance when it comes to:” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1577387761840{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}” el_class=”xm-hide font-size-30px”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron xm-hide”]

  • Which platforms and approaches are most effective for lead gen
  • Top-performing types of lead gen content
  • The importance of automation for lead gen strategy
  • What they expect in the future for social lead building

You’re not alone in wondering whether social media is truly effective for lead generation and selling. We’re providing the answers straight from the mouths of hundreds of experts with one easy download.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner disable_element=”yes” el_class=”xm-hide” css=”.vc_custom_1562845575080{padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_separator color=”green” align=”align_left” border_width=”3″ el_width=”50″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1523913504382{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]”Personalized content and marketing automation are two major pillars of lead generation, which is why we collaborated with SharpSpring to share valuable strategies for digital marketers.” – Claire Berge, Director of Marketing at Brandpoint[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”158563″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

Ready to learn more?

Month-to-month options. No long-term contract required.

START HERE
[/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_raw_js]JTNDc2NyaXB0JTNFJTBBJTBBJTI0JTI4ZG9jdW1lbnQlMjkucmVhZHklMjhmdW5jdGlvbiUyOCUyOSU3QiUwQSUyMCUyNCUyOCUyMmlmcmFtZSUyMiUyOS5hdHRyJTI4JTIyc2Nyb2xsaW5nJTIyJTJDJTIwJTIybm8lMjIlMjklM0IlMEElN0QlMjklM0IlMEElMEElM0MlMkZzY3JpcHQlM0U=[/vc_raw_js][/vc_column][/vc_row]
